text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Internal 

Market in Electricity) (No. 5) Regulations 2022.

text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Principal Regulations” means the European

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of
heading: 3. The Principal Regulations are amended –

3. The Principal Regulations are amended – 

(a) 

in Regulation 8 – 

(i) 

in paragraph (1) – 

(I) 

in subparagraph 
“authorities;” for “authorities.”, and 

(r), by 

the substitution of 

(II) by the insertion of the following subparagraph after 

subparagraph (r): 

in respect of the transmission assets that it is 
“(s) 
licenced to own under section 14(1)(e) of the Act of 
1999 – 

(i) 

to maintain the transmission assets, and 

(ii) 

to carry out construction and any other 
works referred to in the development 
plan in accordance with that plan.”, and 

(ii) 

in paragraph (2) – 

(I) 

in subparagraph (b), by the insertion of “52, 53, 54, 
55,” after “51,”, and 

(II) by the substitution of “each of the Board and the 
the extent 
the 

Transmission System Operator, 
applicable” 
for 
Transmission System Operator”, 

the Board

(b) 

in Regulation 18 – 

(i) 

in paragraph (3)(a), by the insertion of “owned by it” after 
“transmission system”, 

(ii) 

in paragraph (4), in subparagraph (d) – 

(I) 

in clause (i), by the substitution of – 

(A) “owned by the Board” for “owner”, and 

(B) “form part of” for “constitute”, and 

(II) 

in clauses (ii) and (iii), by the insertion of “owned by 
the Board” after “transmission system”, and 

(iii) 

in paragraph (6), by the substitution of “the Board in its 
capacity as 
for “the 
transmission system owner”, 

transmission system owner” 

(c) 

in Regulation 19(a), by the insertion of “owned by the Board” 
after the first instance of “transmission system”, and 

(d) 

in Regulation 25(1) – 

(i) 

in paragraph (a), by the insertion of “owned by the Board” 
after the first instance of “transmission system”, 

(ii) 

in paragraph (b), by the deletion of “and”, 

(iii) by 

the 
paragraph (c): 

insertion of 

the following paragraphs after 

“(d) any duty, obligation or requirement of the Board in 
relation to ownership of the transmission system 
shall be treated as a duty, obligation or requirement 
of the transmission system operator, licenced under 
section 14(1)(e) of the Act of 1999, insofar as it 
relates to the transmission system owned by the 
transmission system operator, and 

(e) 

any reference to the transmission system of the Board shall, with 
the necessary modification, be construed as a reference to the 
transmission system of the transmission system operator,”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

3 December, 2022. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, 
Climate and Communications.
